message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of it just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  This is a significant investment, but I'm confident you'll find it to be a profitable one.  Let me know what you think!
